name: The Spark Group
description:
the Spark Group is a boutique digital marketing agency located in NYC. With every project, our goal is to find new and compelling ways to bring brand stories to life in a way that engages the right audiences and drives action and do so in a way that makes them care, desire, trust, and connect.
We work with companies spanning a diverse set of industries: Financial Services, Real Estate, Technology, Lifestyle, Health & Fitness, Retail.
